summary:
My RETAIL journey started in store – stacking clothes, handling the till, keeping inventory. Though hard work, it was also the most impactful experience of my career – amidst one of the most influential BRANDS in the world – NIKE.

Over the past 15 years I evolved as the BRAND evolved; working and living in both London as well as Amsterdam. Most of this time was spent interacting with functions closely involved with store planning, design, allocation, and space management. In terms of interface, a lot of this time was spent with external vendors and store / merchandise planners. And the best part was the chance to dabble with real estate – a topic that I am personally drawn to, despite never academically pursuing. 

I thrive well in a dynamic environment that offers a constructive workplace for communicating and interacting with customers and people.
